alert.note: Alert for Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:52AM CDT until July 29 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN NEMAHA AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 851 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Table Rock to 5 miles north of Axtell to near Marysville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Marysville, Frankfort, Axtell, Beattie, Summerfield, Vermillion, Oketo, Baileyville and Bremen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
